Starting this season in Europe’s top flight, Momento Market will be hosting in-game auctions in partnership with many of Europe’s top clubs for fans to bid to win the match-worn shirts players are wearing on the pitch. 

You’ll also find a growing archive of personal memorabilia from some of Europe’s top footballers, past and present, straight from their closets and now on display to be celebrated on Momento Market.

Momento Market is football’s auction house.

Auctions

Timed windows where you can bid to win exclusive items — whether this is for match-worn shirts during a live match (with auctions beginning at kick-off) or curated selections of partner’s exclusive memorabilia.

Collections

We’ve partnered with legends of the game, past and present, to highlight their match-worn memorabilia collections and the stories behind them. Whether they’re items saved from their own career or swapped with their most respected peers, these collections are available to view in app — with more items added every week.

Stories

Telling the stories of fans and players to tie together the unique shared experience of those on and off the pitch, our team of world-class creatives provide you thrilling cultural and sporting context to illuminate iconic sports memorabilia and the histories behind them. 

Community

Share your memories, collections, and more with a community of like-minded sports fans and collectors from around the world — and soon you’ll have the opportunity to join forces and bid on grail items with members of your in-app Supporters Clubs. 

If you have questions about the app, please contact us at support@momentomarket.com

In football today, the goalkeeper is a crucial part of the team and has significant impact on the final score of the match. To get the most of a goalkeeper, his training has to be adapted to specific age and performance classes. By properly selected exercises, explanations and carefully selected training units, the goalkeeper can progress more efficiently. According to your specific targets and aim of your training, you should select the appropriate application. Training of children and youth is divided into individual categories, which makes work with young goalkeepers much easier. The section which deals with how to keep the goalkeeper fit includes exercises aimed at developing physical abilities by means of match-like training with the ball. The training of 16 to 19 year olds is the same as with adults. When developing a young goalkeeper's physical abilities, the intensity of the load has to be increased continuously. All exercises are appropriate for men, women, boys and girls.

The application contains 46 free exercises which are completely described and illustrated by computer pictures. Most of them are completed by a video. In the chapter “Crosses” (16 – 19 and adults - Technical and tactical preparation - Crosses), you can find a complete training session with all parameters. You can buy the other exercises in a pack of 10. New training sessions with different topics will regularly be proposed to the coaches.

• Free exercises: **57**
• Free videos: **55*
• Free diagrams: **59**
• Free explanations: **8**
• Free training sessions: **2**

• Paying exercises: **780**
• Videos which complete the paying exercises: **740**
• Paying diagrams: **820**
• Paying explanations: **7**
• Paying training sessions: **29**

You need an internet connection to watch the free videos. After have bought a first pack, you can download and store all the free videos on your smartphone or tablet.  

The exercises were created with PRO TRAINING SYSTEMS.

All players will be notified directly on their mobiles. You can also communicate with players and your team or coach. Find your club and book a tennis court. There are thousands of clubs listed from more than seventy countries. You will also receive automated news across your region and favorite hubs, clubs and friends.
Have fun and play more!

Play Darts? 
Whether in your house, the pub or part of a darts league, make the scoring simple. 

If you struggle to add up the scores then take them away from your total, look no further. This app will do it for you with a few touches.

Input your initials, names, or team names in the 'Name boxes'. Play your three darts and enter the score in the 'score box' or (enter the score for each dart in the three boxes).
PRESS the 'Round Button', and the score will automatically be taken off from your game score. 

At the end of the game PRESS 'new game button', this will swap players around for starting…. if you do not want to swap players, PRESS the 'new game' button again.

To alter the game starting amount (501) type in the score you wish to start with e.g. 301 then PRESS 'new game button'.



The 'Undo Last' button will undo 1 miss entered score from each player / team. (this will only work properly if you have the names set.)

Once you get down to a finish, the darts scores required to get your finish will be displayed on the screen to help you. out.

The ACR OLAS App turns your smartphone or tablet into a Man Overboard Alarm system that aids fast recovery to rescue your crew, kids, pets who have gone overboard.  When the Free app is paired with either the ACR OLAS TAG or the ACR OLAS FLOAT-ON beacons, the OLAS mobile application technology detects a break in its ‘virtual tether’ to the ACR OLAS Tag and/or Float-On within 8 seconds of a transmitter going missing. The mobile phone(s) then sounds an alarm and records the latitude and longitude of the incident using the phone or tablets GPS.  ACR OLAS then aids the crew with the MOB recovery by clearly directing them to the GPS location where the MOB occurred with clear visual signals and bearing data. ACR OLAS stores all location data and time of incident required by the rescue services.  

Other ACR OLAS APP Features:
•	Protect everyone onboard your boat including Crew, Family, Kids, and Pets
•	ACR OLAS App creates a virtual tether to the Tag or Float-On creating a wireless MOB System
•	No cell service required (except for Solo mode)
•	Connect multiple OLAS transmitters to 1 phone or tablet
•	Connect 1 OLAS transmitter to multiple phones / tablets
•	Solo Mode (Text Message Alerts to Emergency Contacts with GPS coordinates)
•	App Navigation: Back to point of loss
•	Automatic VHF script for MOB alert
